variables.name: BLOCK_MESSAGE
variables.label: Block Message
variables.help: Message shown to users when content is blocked
variables.default: Content blocked by security policy. Please rephrase without instructing how to respond.

variables.name: BLOOM_ROUTE_TO_AC
variables.label: Bloom route_to_ac_threshold
variables.help: Score (0-100) to trigger additional validation checks. Lower = more sensitive (default: 15)

variables.name: BLOOM_HARD_BLOCK
variables.label: Bloom hard_block_threshold
variables.help: Score (0-100) to immediately block without further analysis. Higher = fewer false positives (default: 50)

variables.name: BLOOM_REQUIRE_EXTRA
variables.label: Require additional signals
variables.help: Require multiple indicators before blocking. Reduces false positives (default: enabled)

variables.name: BLOOM_PHRASE_BONUS
variables.label: Bloom phrase match bonus
variables.help: Points added per matched phrase (0-100)

variables.name: BLOOM_M
variables.label: Bloom filter size (m)
variables.help: Bits allocated for bloom filter. Larger = fewer false positives, more memory (default: 32768)

variables.name: BLOOM_K
variables.label: Bloom hash functions (k)
variables.help: Number of hash functions. More = better accuracy, slower processing (default: 5)

variables.name: REMOVE_ZERO_WIDTH
variables.label: Remove zero-width
variables.help: Strip invisible Unicode characters used for obfuscation. Recommended for security (default: enabled)

variables.name: COLLAPSE_WS
variables.label: Normalize spaces
variables.help: Merge multiple spaces/tabs/newlines. Prevents whitespace obfuscation (default: enabled)

variables.name: DECODE_ENTITIES
variables.label: Decode HTML entities
variables.help: Convert HTML entities (< to <). Essential for web input security (default: enabled)

variables.name: UNICODE_FORM
variables.label: Unicode normalization form
variables.help: NFC / NFD / NFKC / NFKD

variables.name: HEAVY_MAX_REMOVAL
variables.label: Heavy sanitization: max removal %
variables.help: Maximum percentage (0-100) of text removable during heavy sanitization (default: 60)

variables.name: HEAVY_POLICY
variables.label: Over-limit policy
variables.help: sanitize_if_exceeds | block_if_exceeds

variables.name: NGRAM_MIN
variables.label: N-gram min
variables.help: Shortest substring length for pattern analysis. Smaller = more patterns caught (default: 3)

variables.name: NGRAM_MAX
variables.label: N-gram max
variables.help: Longest substring length for pattern analysis. Larger = longer patterns caught (default: 6)

variables.name: NGRAM_PREFIX_WINDOW
variables.label: N-gram prefix window
variables.help: Number of characters analyzed at input beginning for patterns (default: 96)

variables.name: PII_ENABLED
variables.label: Enable PII Detection
variables.help: Enable automatic redaction of personally identifiable information using Microsoft Presidio

variables.name: PII_DETECTION_MODE
variables.label: Detection Mode
variables.help: Choose detection sensitivity profile based on your use case

variables.name: PII_FALLBACK_TO_REGEX
variables.label: Fallback to Regex
variables.help: Use legacy regex patterns if Presidio API is offline or fails

variables.name: PII_CONTEXT_ENHANCEMENT
variables.label: Context Enhancement
variables.help: Analyze surrounding text for better accuracy (e.g., 'PESEL:' keyword before number)

variables.name: PII_API_TIMEOUT_MS
variables.label: API Timeout (ms)
variables.help: Request timeout for Presidio API in milliseconds (1000-10000)

variables.name: PII_REDACTION_MODE
variables.label: Redaction Mode
variables.help: How to redact detected PII: replace with token, hash, or mask

variables.name: ARBITER_WEIGHT_HEURISTICS
variables.label: Heuristics Weight (Branch A)
variables.help: Weight for pattern matching and entropy analysis (0.0-1.0). Default: 0.30

variables.name: ARBITER_WEIGHT_SEMANTIC
variables.label: Semantic Weight (Branch B)
variables.help: Weight for embedding similarity analysis (0.0-1.0). Default: 0.35

variables.name: ARBITER_WEIGHT_LLM_GUARD
variables.label: LLM Guard Weight (Branch C)
variables.help: Weight for Llama Guard ML classification (0.0-1.0). Default: 0.35

variables.name: ARBITER_BLOCK_SCORE
variables.label: Block Threshold
variables.help: Combined score threshold to block content (0-100). Default: 50

variables.name: ARBITER_CONFIDENCE_MIN
variables.label: Minimum Confidence
variables.help: Minimum confidence required for decision (0.0-1.0). Default: 0.6

variables.name: ARBITER_BOOST_CONSERVATIVE_ENABLED
variables.label: Conservative Override
variables.help: Block if ANY branch reports HIGH threat (≥70). Default: enabled

variables.name: ARBITER_BOOST_CONSERVATIVE_MIN
variables.label: Conservative Min Score
variables.help: Minimum score for conservative override (0-100). Default: 70

variables.name: ARBITER_BOOST_SEMANTIC_ENABLED
variables.label: Semantic High Similarity Boost
variables.help: Add boost when semantic similarity exceeds threshold. Default: enabled

variables.name: ARBITER_BOOST_SEMANTIC_THRESHOLD
variables.label: Semantic Similarity Threshold
variables.help: Similarity threshold to trigger boost (0.0-1.0). Default: 0.85

variables.name: ARBITER_BOOST_SEMANTIC_VALUE
variables.label: Semantic Boost Value
variables.help: Points to add when similarity exceeds threshold (0-100). Default: 15

variables.name: ARBITER_BOOST_UNANIMOUS_ENABLED
variables.label: Unanimous Low Override
variables.help: Allow if ALL branches report LOW threat (≤30). Default: enabled

variables.name: ARBITER_BOOST_UNANIMOUS_MAX
variables.label: Unanimous Max Score
variables.help: Maximum score for unanimous low override (0-100). Default: 30

variables.name: ARBITER_BOOST_LLM_VETO_ENABLED
variables.label: LLM Guard Veto
variables.help: Block if LLM Guard is certain (score ≥90). Default: enabled

variables.name: ARBITER_BOOST_LLM_VETO_THRESHOLD
variables.label: LLM Veto Threshold
variables.help: LLM Guard score threshold for veto (0-100). Default: 90
